title: DeMarcus Cousins | Ep 16 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Podcast | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: DeMarcus Cousins | Ep 16 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Podcast | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
On Episode 16 of All The Smoke, Matt and Stephen are joined by Lakers big man DeMarcus Cousins. Cousins talks about his relationship with Anthony Davis, being on the star-studded Lakers, and gives an update on how his 2nd rehab in as many years is progressing. He also discusses the early stages of his career playing for Sacramento and being traded to New Orleans.

#SHOWTIMEBasketball #AllTheSmoke #DeMarcusCousins
